thread.title: George Mason Manager Makes Play Of The Day, Saves Rogue Contact Lens
thread.title_full: George Mason Manager Makes Play Of The Day, Saves Rogue Contact Lens

author: Patrick Redford
title: George Mason Manager Makes Play Of The Day, Saves Rogue Contact Lens

organizations.name: saves rogue contact lens george mason

text:
George Mason is matched up with Fordham in the Atlantic-10 tournament tonight. The Patriots led through most of the first half, but the best play of the game so far came from graduate manager Bryson Johnson. Advertisement 
Early in the first half, star point guard Otis Livingston was forced to go to the bench after getting poked in the eye. Livingston lost a contact lens in the collision, which Johnson somehow retrieved after spotting on the floor from all the way across the court. 
Gotta give him a ring if they win the tournament. Recommended Stories
